1b1(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sam tsA ra pra ta bi d+hig ga
1b2(mdo sde): dzu ti bi na yak+Shan ti nA ma ma hA lA/ na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags
1b3(mdo sde): p a yang dag por spyod pa'i tshulanam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul
2a1(mdo sde): ba'i bzod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ / // bam po dang
2a2(mdo sde): po/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di
2a3(mdo sde): skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das byed pa tsan nA/ rnyog pa sel
2a4(mdo sde): ba zhes bya ba'i byed pa can gyi grong rdal du snang ba 'phel ba zhes bya ba'i ri la/ drang srong
2b1(mdo sde): rta rlung zhes bya ba dka' thub la gnas pa na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po
2b2(mdo sde): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyis rnam
2b3(mdo sde): par sprul pa/ tshad med pa'i byams pa chen po byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs rjes su thob pa/ tshad med pa'i snying rje chen po dang / sems
2b4(mdo sde): can gyi chu bo kun tu 'chang bar rnam par sprul pa/ tshad med pa'i dga' ba'i byin gyis brlabs kyis stobs kyis/ sems can thams cad
2b5(mdo sde): la bde ba'i dran pa'i char rab tu 'bab pas/ kun tu ngoms pa dang / tshad med pa'i btang snyoms kyi ye shwe kyis/ chos thams cad nam
3a1(mdo sde): mkha' dang mnyam par 'jug pa la mkhas pa chos kyi sprin dang / lhag mthong dang / rig pa dang / ye shes kyi stobs kyi ma rig pa'i
3a2(mdo sde): mun pa'i mun pa chen po rnam par 'jig pa la mkhas pa/ bsdu ba rnam gzhis sems can rnams chu bo bzhi las bsgral bar bya ba'i ye shes dang / sems
3a3(mdo sde): can thams cad la mtshungs par sems pa'i phyir/ byams pa dang khong khro ba med pas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi lam yongs su dag pa/ chos kyis yang dag
3a4(mdo sde): par 'jug pa/ ye shes chen po la mkhas pa/ 'jig rten la mchog gi lam yang dag par ston pa/ sems can rnam par rgyas shing / dge ba'i rtsa bas
3a5(mdo sde): yongs su sred pa'i chu bskam zhing ye shes kyi las kyi mtha' la rab tu 'jug pa/ mngon par shes pa chen po'i ye shes rnam par rtse ba mngon par shes pa
3a6(mdo sde): zla ba lta bu/ sems can thams cad kyi sems mtshungs par shes pa'i bsam pa mngon par yang dag par mgu ba'i phyir/ thabs la mkhas pa 'phel ba
3b1(mdo sde): yang dag par ston pa/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i gzungs kyis tshad med pa'i snod chos rin po ches yongs su bkang zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i phyir/ skye bo thams cad kyis nye bar
3b2(mdo sde): 'tshe ba/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhis rkang pa'i shugs chen pos chos kyi tshul gyi lam zab mo rjes su zhugs pa/ mtshungs pa'i chos kyis gzhan gyi rgol ba thams cad tshar gcod pa/ bskal pa brgya
3b3(mdo sde): stong grangs med pa'i mthar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thug pa med cing rgyun ma bcad pa'i yon tan thams cad 'byung ba/ rlung dang mtshungs pa'i sems 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las
3b4(mdo sde): 'das pa'i chos thams cad kyis gos pa med pa/ bag chags thams cad rjes su 'brel pa nyon mongs pa rab tu spangs pa/ tshad med grangs med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang /
3b5(mdo sde): bzod pas rnam par rtse ba la mkhas pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rta dang glang po che mi dkar ba zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ri rab kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba dang / byang
3b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' ri rab zla ba zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par bsgyings pa mi zad pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dpal zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems
3b7(mdo sde): dpa' mig sngon po zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ngur smrig seng ge sgra 'byin ces bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' nor gyi 'od kyi tshogs shes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ri
4a1(mdo sde): rab mtshams shes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgyal mtshan rnam par sprul pa'i dbyangs shes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' glog gi phung po zhes bya ba dang
4a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' yon tan gyi gzi brjid dri ma med pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ri rab stobs kun tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' gtogs 'dod mthu
4a3(mdo sde): po che zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / de la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bcu dang / sngon du 'gro drang srong rta rlung dang / drang srong stong phrag sum cu dang / lha
4a4(mdo sde): bran brgya stong phrag bco brgyad kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la yongs su bskor nas lhan cig tu 'khod do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa legs par 'ongs pa
4a5(mdo sde): la bka' stsal pa/ legs par 'ongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i seng ge'i khri bshams pa de la bdag 'dug ste/ nyan thos rnams la nyan thos kyi gtam smra bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de
4a6(mdo sde): bzhin no zhes gsol pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa legs par 'ongs pa phyir mnyan te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir pho brang zlum po byas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'kho
4a7(mdo sde): thams cad dang ldan pa la rnam par kun tu bltas te/ pho brang zlum por bshams pa nyid du bzhugs so// de nas dge slong gzhan dag kyang stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa
4b1(mdo sde): gcig tu byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te/ phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten ces bgyi ba btsun pa
4b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten zhes bgyi ba ni gang lags/ de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten du btags pas brtags pa ji lta bu lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
4b3(mdo sde): dge slong de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / dge slong dag 'jig rten 'jig rten ces bya ba dang / de de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten du btags pas/ brtags pa'i ji tsam zhes dge slong
4b4(mdo sde): khyod de skad 'dri 'am/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no// de'i phyir dge slong khyod legs par nyon la shin tu yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do// btsun pa de bzhin no zhes gsol te/ dge slong de
4b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la phyir nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dge slong 'jig rten zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten rnam pa gnyis te/ snod kyi 'jig rten dang 'du byed kyi
4b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten no/ / dge slong de la snod kyi 'jig rten ni gang / 'du byed kyi 'jig rten ni gang zhe na/ sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams ji tsam pa ni snod ces bya'o//
4b7(mdo sde): dge slong de la nang gi sa'i khams yod de/ dge slong de la nang gi sa'i khams gang zhe na/ gang nang gi sra ba'i sra ba nyid zin pa ni 'di lta ste/ rus pa dang / sen mo dang / so'i bar du ste/ 'di dag ni nang
5a1(mdo sde): gi sa'i khams zhes bya'o/ / de la phyi rol gyi sa'i khams gang zhe na/ gang lus kyi phyi rol gyi sa'i khams ni 'di lta ste/ 'gron bu dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang /
5a2(mdo sde): bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / rdo dang / bya ru dang / dngul dang / sa le sbram dang / gram bu dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo dang / shing dang / rtswa dang / sman dang / phyag dar dang / 'di dag ni phyi rol
5a3(mdo sde): gyi sa'i khams zhes bya'o/ / chu'i khams gang zhe na/ phyi rol gyi chu'i khams yod na/ nang gi chu khams kyang yod de/ de la nang gi chu'i khams gang zhe na/ lus 'di la chu dang chu'i khams kyi mkhris
5a4(mdo sde): pa dang / bad kan dang / rnag dang / khrag dang / klad pa dang / klad rgyas dang / mchil ma dang / rdul dang / ngar snabs dang / snabs dang / rus dang / rkang dang / gcin yod pa kun tu len
5a5(mdo sde): pa 'di ni/ nang gi chu'i khams zhes bya'o// de la phyi rol gyi chu'i khams gang zhe na/ gang lus kyi phyi rol gyi chu'i khams ni 'di lta ste/ chu dang / chu'i khams kyi snum pa dang / 'o ma dang zho dang
5a6(mdo sde): / dngar ba dang / bu ram dang / shing gi ro dang / chang dang rtsab mo dang / bu ram chang dang / me tog chang dang / lus kyi phyi rol gyi chu'i khams ji tsam pa kun tu len pa 'di ni phyi rol gyi chu'i khams so//
5a7(mdo sde): de la nang gi me'i khams gang zhe na/ lus 'di la gang skye bo'i mdog gi dro ba kun tu len pa des lus 'di dro ba nyid/ du ba dang / gdungs pa dang / rims dang / yongs su tshig pa dang / des
5b1(mdo sde): zos pa dang / 'thungs pa dang / 'chos pa dang / nyal ba de'i yang dag par yongs su smin par 'gyur ba 'di ni nang gi me'i khams zhes bya'o// de la phyi rol gyi me'i khams gang zhe na/ gang
5b2(mdo sde): me'i gdung ba dang / nyi ma'i gdung ba dang / nor bu'i gdung ba dang / 'bru dang sman dang shing dang / rtswa'i dro ba dang / lci ba'i dro ba dang / phyag dar gyi dro ba dang / 'di dag ni phyi rol gyi me'i khams
5b3(mdo sde): zhes bya'o/ / de la nang gi rlung gi khams gang zhe na/ gang lus 'di la gyen du rgyu ba'i rlung dang / thur tu rgyu ba'i rlung dang / ma zhu ba'i rlung dang / yan lag dang nying lag tu rgyu ba'i rlung dang / 'di ni
5b4(mdo sde): nang gi rlung rnams zhes bya'o/ / de la phyi rol gyi rlung gang zhe na/ gang phyi rol tu yang dag par rgyu ba'i rlung dang / rnam par rgyu ba'i rlung dang / gyen du rgyu ba dang / grang ba dang / dro ba'i dmu rlung phyed pa
5b5(mdo sde): mang po dang / sa 'dzin pa'i rlung dang / phyi rol gyi rlung gi khams gang yang rung ba 'di ni phyi rol gyi rlung gi khams zhes bya ste/ de ltar phyi dang nang gi 'byung ba chen po bzhi po 'di ni/ snod kyi 'jig
5b6(mdo sde): rten zhes bya'o/ / 'di gang gi snad ce na/ nye bar len pa phung po lnga'i snod ngo do// dge slong phyi dang nang gi 'byung ba chen po bzhi po 'di dag la gang mos pa 'am/ dga' ba 'am/ byams pa 'am
5b7(mdo sde): chags pa 'am/ rgya che ba 'am/ nga yir bya ba 'am/ bdag gir bya ba de thams cad spang bar bya'o zhes so sor bslab par bya'o// gang la la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i
6a1(mdo sde): phyi dang nang gi 'am/ che ba 'am/ phra ba 'am/ ngan pa 'am/ bzang ba 'am/ gang ring ba 'am/ gang nye ba 'am/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi po de thams cad de bzhin du so sor
6a2(mdo sde): bslab par bya'o/ / gang la la 'byung ba chen po bzhi po de dag ni bdag gi ma yin/ bdag kyang de'i ma yin/ de yang bdag gi ma yin no zhes de ltar de bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ji lta ba
6a3(mdo sde): bzhin du blta bar bya'o/ / dge slong dag dge slong gang la la 'byung ba chen po bzhi po 'di dag la de bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis shin tu brtan par byed do// shin tu yid la byas pa'i dge
6a4(mdo sde): slong de sred pa dang / rgud pa dang / lus kyi sbyor ba'i rgyun gcod cing sdug bsngal gyi mthar byed pa ste/ dge slong dag 'di ni snod kyi 'jig rten no// dge slong dag de la 'du byed kyi 'jig rten gang
6a5(mdo sde): zhe na/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i 'du byed ces bya'o// lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs nye bar len pa'i phung po dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa
6a6(mdo sde): nye bar len pa'i phung po ste/ dge slong dag 'di ni 'du byed kyi 'jig rten no// dge slong dag sems can ji tsam pa gang sems can gyi bsdu bas yang dag par bsdus pa de thams cad phung po 'di dag
6a7(mdo sde): gis bsdus pa dang ldan pa 'di ni/ 'du byed kyi 'jig rten zhes bya'o// dge slong dag nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po de la gang mos pa 'am/ dga' ba 'am byams pa 'am/ chags pa 'am/ rgya
6b1(mdo sde): che ba 'am/ nga yir bya ba 'am/ bdag gir bya ba de thams cad spang bar bya'o zhes so sor bslab par bya'o// gang chung zad 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'am/ phyi 'am nang gi 'am/
6b2(mdo sde): che ba 'am/ phra ba 'am/ ngan pa 'am/ bzang ba 'am/ gang ring ba 'am/ gang nye ba'i gzugs de thams cad bdag gi ma yin/ bdag kyang de'i ma yin/ de yang bdag ma yin no zhes de ltar de
6b3(mdo sde): bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ji lta ba bzhin du blta bar bya'o/ / gang la la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba 'am/ phyi'i 'am/ nang gi 'am/ che ba 'am/ phra ba 'am/ ngan
6b4(mdo sde): pa 'am/ bzang ba 'am/ gang ring ba 'am/ gang nye ba'i tshor ba dang / gang la la 'du shes dang / gang la la 'du byed dang / gang chung zad rnam par shes pa de thams cad ni bdag gi ma yin bdag
6b5(mdo sde): kyang de ma yin/ de bdag ma yin no zhes de ltar de bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ji lta ba bzhin du blta bar bya ba 'di ni/ dge slong dag snod kyi 'jig rten dang / 'du byed kyi 'jig rten zhes
6b6(mdo sde): bya'o/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu snang ba 'khor der 'dus par gyur te 'dug par gyur pa des/ byang chub sems dpa' phung po rnam par 'jig pa la smras pa/ tshe dang
6b7(mdo sde): ldan pa phung po rnam par 'jig pa bcom ldan 'das kyis phung po lnga po 'di 'jig rten du bstan pa ni 'di lta ste/ gzugs kyi phung po dang / tshor ba'i phung po dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang /
7a1(mdo sde): rnam par shes pa'i phung po'o// tshe dang ldan pa phung po lnga po de dag ni ji lta bu/ gzugs kyi phung po ni gang / 'dod pa'i khams mig dang / gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba
7a2(mdo sde): yang dag par gzhol ba dang / de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang mig dang / gzugs kyi 'gog pa yang dag par gzhol ba zhig gam/ gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i
7a3(mdo sde): khams kyi mig dang / gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba yang dag par gzhol ba dang / de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi mig dang / gzugs kyi 'dod chags
7a4(mdo sde): dang bral bas yang dag par gzhol ba ni gang ci gzugs kyi phung po 'dod pa'i khams mig dang / gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba yang dag par gzhol ba dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang /
7a5(mdo sde): lus dang / yid kyang mig dang / gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba yang dag par gzhol ba dang / gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams mig dang / gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba
7a6(mdo sde): yang dag par gzhol ba 'am/ 'on te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa 'dod pa'i khams mig dang / gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba yang dag par gzhol
7a7(mdo sde): ba dang / gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams mig dang / gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba yang dag par gzhol ba 'am/ ci 'das pa gzugs kyi phung po 'am/ mig dang gzugs kyi
7b1(mdo sde): 'dod chags dang bral ba yang dag par gzhol ba dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid nas mig gi bar du'am/ gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams mig dang / gzugs
7b2(mdo sde): kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba yang dag par gzhol ba zhig gam/ 'on te tsher ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang dag par gzhol ba zhig gam/ 'on te da ltar
7b3(mdo sde): byung ba gzugs kyi phung po 'am/ mig dang gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i mig nas
7b4(mdo sde): yid kyi bar du yang dag par gzhol ba zhig gam/ 'on te tshor ba nas yid kyi bar du'am/ 'on te ma 'ongs pa gzugs kyi phung po 'am/ mig dang gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba
7b5(mdo sde): dang / de rna ba nas yid kyi bar du yang dag par gzhol ba zhig gam/ 'on te tshor ba nas yid kyi bar du'am// de nas byang chub sems dpa' phung po rnam par 'jig pas/
7b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' kun tu snang ba la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu 'god pa'i chos ltos/ mig gi bu gar gzugs kyi phung po dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba 'phos pa'ang ma
7b7(mdo sde): yin/ mig gi bu gar tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i phung po dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba 'phos pa yang ma yin/ skye mched ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog cing
8a1(mdo sde): @#ldang ba'ang ma yin/ phung po ni ngag gi lam dang / dbyangs dang / sgra dang / brjod pa las yang dag par shin tu 'das pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu chos thams cad
8a2(mdo sde): ni skad cig ma ste/ dngos po dang bral ba'o// chos thams cad ni dbyangs med pa'o// dbyangs dang bral ba'o// chos thams cad ni nam mkha'i lam ste mtshan ma med pa'o// chos thams cad ni yi
8a3(mdo sde): ge med pa'o/ / smon pa med pa'o// chos thams cad ni skye ba med pa'o// stong pa'o// chos thams cad ni thob pa med pa'o// tshig med pa'o// chos thams cad ni rtog pa dang bral ba'o// mi khom
8a4(mdo sde): pa'o/ / chos thams cad ni chags pa dang bral ba'o// rkyen med pa'o// chos thams cad ni sbyor ba dang bral ba'o// dmigs pa med pa'o// chos thams cad ni lta ba dang bral ba'o// mtshan
8a5(mdo sde): nyid dben pa'o/ / chos thams cad ni dmigs pa dang bral ba'o// bdag med pa'o// chos thams cad ni bdag dang bral ba'o// brjod du med pa'o// chos thams ni yi ge dang bral ba'o// rab tu
8a6(mdo sde): zhi ba'o/ / chos thams cad ni chos nyid mi thob pa'o// mi snang ba thob pa'o// chos thams cad ni snang ba dang bral ba'o// shin tu yul med pa'o// chos thams cad ni yul dang bral ba'o// shin
8a7(mdo sde): tu rtsa ba med pa'o/ / chos thams cad ni dbang po med pa'o// shin tu rang bzhin med pa'o// chos thams cad ni spyod pa rnam par dag pa'o// gnyen po med pa'o// chos thams cad ni sems
8b1(mdo sde): meng pa'o/ / chags pa dang bral ba'o// chos thams cad ni shin tu 'phros pa'o// phun sum tshogs pa dang bral ba'o// chos thams cad ni 'jungs pa med pa'o// spros pa med pa'o// chos
8b2(mdo sde): thams cad ni shin tu bsam gtan dang ldan pa'o/ / g.yo ba dang bral ba'o// chos thams cad ni shin tu sgrib pa med pa'o// rdul dang bral ba'o// shin tu bral ba'o// chos thams cad ni nyon
8b3(mdo sde): mongs pa dang bral ba'o/ / stobs chung ba'o// chos thams cad ni rtsom pa dang bral ba'o// dngos po med pa'o// chos thams cad ni dngos po dang bral ba'o// byed pa med pa'o// chos thams
8b4(mdo sde): cad ni las mi ston pa'o/ / tshor ba med pa'o// chos thams cad ni nam mkha' dang ldan pa'o// thos pa med pa'o// chos thams cad ni dbyangs dang bral ba'o// gzung du med pa'o//
8b5(mdo sde): chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis sdug pa'o// shes pa med pa'o// chos thams cad ni tshor ba chags pa med pa'o// smig rgyu lta bu'o// chos thams cad ni 'du shes dang bral ba'o// brag cha
8b6(mdo sde): lta bu'o/ / chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid med pa'o// gzugs brnyan lta bu'o// chos thams cad ni rab tu snang ba'i 'od rnam par dag pa chu zla lta bu'o// chos thams cad ni gzugs brnyan dang bral
8b7(mdo sde): ba'o/ / gzugs brnyan la rten pa'o// chos thams cad ni sprin mi dmigs pa'o// nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'o// chos thams cad ni gzugs brnyan no// bstan du med pa'o//
9a1(mdo sde): dngos po med pa'o// dngos po dang bral ba'o// mtshan nyid med pa nas mtshan nyid med pa dang / mtshan nyid dang bral ba dang / mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid dang / mtshan
9a2(mdo sde): nyid gcig pa dang mtshan nyid med pa'i bar du'o/ / chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o// chos thams cad ni bdag tu mi dmigs pa'o// ngar sems pa med pa'o// rten med pa'o//
9a3(mdo sde): brjod du med pa'o// chos thams cad ni yi ge med pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'du byed thams cad ni skad cig ma zad pa dang bral ba'o// zhes nyon mongs pa dang 'khrug pa med par bya/
9a4(mdo sde): ba'i phyir/ bdag dang gzhan la gnod pa med pa dang / spros pa med pa'i bzod pa bsgom par bya'o// 'di la rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i dbang gi bzod pa bsgom pa na yang
9a5(mdo sde): dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa zhes bya ba thob bo/ / bzod pa 'di thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' skad cig ma gcig dang yang dag par ldan pa tsam gyis//
9a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul shin tu phra ba snyed las lhag par lus yongs su sprul to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi phyogs bcu stong pa dang / rnyog pa lnga yi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du
9a7(mdo sde): song ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing re rer yang rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char gtong ba ni 'di lta ste/ zas kyi char ram/ skom gyi char ram/ gos sam/ lhab lhub bam
9b1(mdo sde): dri'am me tog gam/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi char kyang rab tu 'ong ngo // gang sems can zas dang skom de yongs su zos pas/ zang zing med pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba thob pa'i sems can de/
9b2(mdo sde): 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa/ sdug bsngal ba/ bdag med pa/ stong pa nyid kyi dran pa dang tshul khrims thob bo// khyim gyis bcings pa thams cad dang / 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga spangs
9b3(mdo sde): te byung nas/ ri'i sul dang / khyim med pa stong pa'i nags tshal stug por gnas par 'gyur ro// drang srong gi cha byad kyis rtswa dang rtsa ba dang / 'bras bu'i zas la gnas par 'gyur ro// nye bar
9b4(mdo sde): len pa'i phung po lnga po de dag la mi bzad par mos shing / brtson 'grus rtsom pa la spro bar byed do// nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag la nad dang / shu ba dang / zug rngu dang / mi rtag pa dang /
9b5(mdo sde): sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med par yid la byed do// mngon par shes pa lnga thob bo// tshangs pa dang 'jig rten la gzhol bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du gos nas rin po che yongs su
9b6(mdo sde): sbyang ba'i bar du yongs su spyod par byed do/ / de shes pas zang zing med pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba thob pa nas tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi bar du gzhol bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' de
9b7(mdo sde): l tar de bzhin du gang yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa 'di dag thob pa de snyim pas me tog nam mkha' la gtor ba'i me tog de phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul
10a1(mdo sde): shin tu phra ba snyed kyi stong pa dang / rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skad cig ma gcig gis song ba'i me tog re re la yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi chos kyi sku
10a2(mdo sde): brjod pa'i dbyangs 'byung ba ni 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad dbyangs med pa'o// bdud bzhi'i yul las 'da' ba'o// chos thams cad ni nam mkha'i lam mo// gnas yang dag par spong ba'o// yi ge
10a3(mdo sde): med pa'o/ / chos thams cad ni chags pa yang dag par gzhol ba'o// mi skye ba'o// chos thams cad ni nyon mongs pa yang dag par gzhol ba'o// ma 'gags pa'o// chos thams cad ni sngon gyi dam
10a4(mdo sde): tshig mi gtong ba'o/ / mtshan nyid med pa'o// chos thams cad ni chags pa yang dag par gtong ba'o// rkyen med pa'o// chos thams cad ni kun tu sbyor ba yang dag par gtong ba'o// gnas med
10a5(mdo sde): pa'o/ / chos thams cad ni rtsom pa med pa'o// chos thams cad ni bdag gir bya ba dang / nga yir bya ba yang dag par gtong ba'o// chos thams cad na dben pa'o// 'du 'dzi yang dag par gtong ba'o/
10a6(mdo sde): bdag med pa'o// chos thams cad ni bdag dang bral ba nas brjod du med pa'i bar du/ rab tu zhi ba'o// mi snang ba thob pa'o// mi gnas pa'o// shin tu yul med pa'o// shin tu rtsa ba med pa'o//
10a7(mdo sde): shin tu rang bzhin med pa'o// gnyen po med pa'o// kha zas med pa'o// shin tu 'thor ba'o// 'jungs pa med pa'o// shin tu bsam gtan byed pa'o// shin tu sgribs pa med pa'o//
10b1(mdo sde): shin tu 'ong ba med pa'o// nyam chung ba'o// dngos po med pa'o// byed pa med pa'o// tshor ba med pa'o// zag pa med pa'o// 'dzin pa med pa'o// rnam par shes pa med pa'o// smig/
10b2(mdo sde): rgyu lta bu'o// brag cha lta bu'o// mig yor lta bu'o// chu zla lta bu'o// gzugs brnyan lta bu'o// nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'o// dngos po med pa'o// mtshan nyid med pa nas mtshan nyid
10b3(mdo sde): med pa dang mtshan nyid dang bral ba dang / mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid dang / mtshan nyid gcig pa dang / mtshan nyid med pa'i bar du'o// chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o// ngar sems
10b4(mdo sde): pa med pa'o/ / gzungs du med pa'o// brjod du med pa'o// chos thams cad ni skad cig ma'o// 'du byed zad pa dang bral ba'o zhes bzod pa'i sems bsgom par bya'o// chos
10b5(mdo sde): thams cad ni skad cig ma zhes zhi ba'i sems bsgom par bya'o/ / mnyam pa'i sems dang rnam par zhi ba'i sems dang / 'dzin pa med pa'i sems dang / 'byung ba med pa'i sems
10b6(mdo sde): dang / sgrib pa med pa'i sems dang / chod pa med pa'i sems dang / phyin ci ma log pa'i sems dang / rten med pa'i sems dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems dang / sdug
10b7(mdo sde): bsngal gyi sems bsgom par bya'o/ / de bzhin du nye bar zhi ba stong pa phyi dang nang gi 'jig pa brjod pa'i chos kyi sgo dang / tshad med grangs med pa'i chos kyi sgo me tog de dag la 'byung bar 'gyur
11a1(mdo sde): ro/ / sems can de yang chos kyi sgo de thos nas/ zang zing med pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba thob pa des 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa/ sdug bsngal ba/ bdag med
11a2(mdo sde): pa stong pa nyid kyi dran pa dang tshul khrims thob bo/ / khyim gyi bcing pa thams cad dang / 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yang dag par spangs te byung nas ri'i sul dang / khyim med pa stong pa'i nags tshal
11a3(mdo sde): stug por gnas par 'gyur ro/ / drang srong gi cha byad kyis 'bras bu dang / rtsa ba dang / rtswa'i zas la gnas par 'gyur ro// nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po de dag la mi bzad par mos shing /
11a4(mdo sde): brtson 'grus rtsom pa la spro bar byed do// nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag la nad dang / shu ba dang / zug rngu dang / mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med par yid
11a5(mdo sde): la byed do/ / mngon par shes pa lnga thob bo// tshangs pa dang 'jig rten la gzhol bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' 'di 'dra ba'i bzod pa bsgom pa de na mi dmigs/ sems
11a6(mdo sde): can mi dmigs/ srog mi dmigs gsob mi dmigs/ gang zag mi dmigs/ gzugs mi dmigs/ tshor ba ma yin/ 'du shes ma yin/ 'du byed ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'ang mi
11a7(mdo sde): dmigs/ mig mi dmigs/ rna ba yang ma yin/ sna yang ma yin/ lce yang ma yin/ lus kyang mi dmigs/ yid kyang mi dmigs so// gzugs mi dmigs/ sgra mi dmigs/ drim
11b1(mdo sde): dmigs/ ro mi dmigs/ reg mi dmigs/ chos mi dmigs/ yid mi dmigs/ lus mi dmigs/ tshig mi dmigs/ sems mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid mi sogs pa/ mtshan
11b2(mdo sde): ma med pa/ thug pa khams gsum gtong ba med pa/ mngon par 'du mi byed pa ma skyes pa/ ma bsgoms pa/ ma byang ba'i bzod pa 'di smras so// ma byas pa/ bya ba med pa/ de sngon gyi
11b3(mdo sde): mtha' la bya ba med pa/ phyi ma'i mtha' la 'das pa med pa/ dbus kyi mtha' la yang dag par med pa/ mi gnas pa mi dmigs pa/ yid la mi byed pa'i bzod pa bsgom pa na/ byang
11b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i bzod pa thob bo/ / byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa 'di thob pas/ ji lta
11b5(mdo sde): bur gong du bshad pa'i rtsal 'di 'dra ba bya bar 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa' phung po rnam par 'jig pas 'di bstan pa ston cing brjod pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par mi rtog pa zhes
11b6(mdo sde): bya bas legs so zhes bya ba byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' mang po dag cang mi smra bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas zhal gyis bzhes par gyur pa dang /
11b7(mdo sde): nas dge slong drug cu tsam 'di snyam du sems te/ rigs kyi bu phung po rnam par 'jig pa ci la bsams te/ rnam pa 'di lta bu'i sgyu ma 'dra ba'i 'du byed thams cad ston/ gal te gzugs
12a1(mdo sde): bdag med pa mi snang ba/ kun nas ldang ba med pa/ yid la mi byed pa/ mi rtog pa/ rnam par mi rtog pa/ dmigs pa med pa/ rgyu ba med pa 'am/ 'on te 'di lta bu
12a2(mdo sde): ci sems can nam/ srog gam/ skye ba 'am/ gso ba 'am/ gang zag gam/ shed las skyes pa 'am shed can nam/ byed pa po 'am/ tshor ba po 'am/ tshor ba gzhan nam/ skye ba
12a3(mdo sde): 'am/ yang dag par skye ba 'am/ gang mi dga' ba 'am/ mi 'byung ba med par 'gyur ba 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gang du byung / snying rje chen po ni gang na/ chos 'chad pa ni su zhig
12a4(mdo sde): chos kun shes pa ni gang zhig/ bslab pa sdom pa ni gang na gnas/ gal te phung por mi 'gyur na/ de ltar khams dang skye mched rnams kyang dge ba rnams kyi chos kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin par
12a5(mdo sde): mi 'gyur na/ legs par byas pa dang / nyes par byas pa'i las kyi 'bras bu ni gang du smin/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni gang du 'byung /
12a6(mdo sde): nyan thos dang / rang rgyal ba rnams dang / lha dang mi rnams dang / gang gzhan yang sems can gyi lus skye mched drug gis bzung ba ni gang du 'byung / bdag ni stan las langs te 'gro bar bya/
12a7(mdo sde): snyam mo// de nas dge slong drug cu tsam stan las langs te dong nas/ dge slong gzhan dag kyang cang mi smra bar gyur pa dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' phung po rnam par
12b1(mdo sde): 'jig pa bcom ldan 'das la ngo tsha zhing mi spobs pa dang gnong par gyur to/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na mar me/ 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur pa des/ byang chub sems dpa' phung
12b2(mdo sde): po rnam par 'jig pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ / don gyi dbang gang mthong ba na 'khor smra ba dang bcas pa la chos kyi tshul rnam pa 'di lta bu zab mo yang dag par ston/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das kyis
12b3(mdo sde): mdo sde gzhan las gang zag lnga rnams la chos kyi gtam dang / gtam ngan pa dang / dad pa med pa la dad pa'i gtam dang / gtam ngan pa dang / 'jungs pa la gtong ba'i gtam dang / gtam ngan
12b4(mdo sde): pa dang tshul khrims ngan pa la tshul khrims kyi gtam dang / gtam ngan pa dang / le lo can la brtson 'grus kyi gtam dang / gtam ngan pa dang / 'chal pa'i shes rab la shes rab kyi gtam dang /
12b5(mdo sde): gtam ngan pa'o zhes 'di ltar gsungs so// yang bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde gzhan las bstan pa// mtshams med par byed pa rnams la stong pa'i gtam mi smra bar bya'o// log par lta ba'i
12b6(mdo sde): lus can rnams la lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa mi smra bar bya'o/ / brkam pa rnams la tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa mi smra bar bya'o// nga rgyal dang dregs pa dang kha zas la chags pa rnams la
12b7(mdo sde): sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa mi smra bar bya'o/ / ngo tsha ba'i chos kyi rtsa ba spong ba rnams la chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa mi smra bar bya'o// mi thob par 'dod pa rnams la lhar skye ba'i yon tan
13a1(mdo sde): mi smra bar bya'o/ / 'dod pa la spyod pa'i lhar skye ba yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la mdangs 'phrog pa'i gnod sbyin skye ba'i yon tan mi smra bar bya'o// gzugs la spyod
13a2(mdo sde): pa'i lhar skye ba bzung ba rnams la 'dod pa'i spyod pa'i lha dang dpal mi smra bar bya'o/ / gzugs med pa'i khams su skye ba yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la gzugs la spyod pa'i yon tan mi
13a3(mdo sde): smra bar bya'o/ / gzugs la spyod pa'i lhar skye ba bzung ba rnams la 'dod pa spyod pa'i lha'i bde ba mi smra bar bya'o// nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la rang sangs rgyas kyi
13a4(mdo sde): yon tan mi smra bar bya'o/ / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la nyan thos kyi yon tan dag mi smra bar bya'o// theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la rang sangs
13a5(mdo sde): rgyas kyi yon tan mi smra bar bya'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par brtson pa rnams la bsdu ba'i dngos po rnam pa bzhi mi smra bar bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa'i rnam
13a6(mdo sde): par spyod pa la mngon par brtson pa rnams la tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa bzhi mi smra bar bya'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' 'khor smra ba med pa la rnam pa 'di lta bu zab mo zhi ba stong pa nyid kyi gtam
13a7(mdo sde): mi smra bar bya'o/ / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i 'khor rnam pa 'di lta bu'i smra ba dang bcas pa'i mdun du yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa zab mo
13b1(mdo sde): 'di mi smra bar bya'o/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'khor mang po de thams cad dang ldan pas mgrin gcig tu legs so zhes bya ba byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang byang chub
13b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' lag na mar me la legs so zhes bya ba'i tshig gis spro ba yang dag par bskyed do/ / legs so legs so shes rab che// rnam par shes pas mchog gcod pa// mtshan nyid thabs dang
13b3(mdo sde): chos rnams kyi/ / dus ni khyod kyis rab tu shes// 'khor rnams shes pa ci 'dra ba// de 'dra'i tshul du ston par byed// nyan thos rang rgyal theg pa la// chos 'di brjod par mi byed do// nam mkha' mtshungs
13b4(mdo sde): shing mnyam pa yi/ / byang chub sems dpa'i mdun dag tu// chos 'di rab tu bstan pas na// tshul 'di rab tu shes par 'gyur// nam mkha' ji ltar mtho byed la// dma' ba med cing gzugs med
13b5(mdo sde): pa/ shes rab pha rol phyin spyod pa'i// byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan nyid med// bskal pa grangs med pa dag gi/ 'das pa'i rgyal ba'i spyan sngar ni// smra ba med pa'i 'khor rnams la//
13b6(mdo sde): khyod kyi chos 'di thos pa dang // ji ltar rgyal ba des bstan pa'i// grags pa chen po'i bzod pa 'di// brtson 'grus brtan pa'i sems can la// 'jigs med pa 'di rab tu bstan// byang chub
13b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' rab dag cing / / yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' med pa// skal pa ldan pa'i mdun du ni// chos 'di yang ni bar tu bstan// nyan thos theg pa mngon brtson dang // rang rgyal dag gis mngon
14a1(mdo sde): dga' la/ / chos 'di rab tu bstan pas na// de nyid 'tshang rgyar mi 'gyur ro// mi shes pas ni spong ba dang // mos pa med par skyes pas na// bsod nams mang po 'byung med
14a2(mdo sde): cing / ngan 'gror yang ni myur du 'gro// ting 'dzin bzod pa'i gzungs kyis ni// gal te de lus dbyangs byas te// byang chub lam la brtson bya'i phyir// la la thabs dang bral ba la// 'khor dang /
14a3(mdo sde): gang zag rnams kyis kyang // sems kyis rtog par mi byed do// 'chal pa'i shes rab snod min la// stong pa'i zhi ba smra bar byed// de yang myur du spangs pas na// mun pa'i phung pos bsgribs
14a4(mdo sde): pa dag/ gzhan dag gi ni gnas bcu la// myur du yang ni 'gro bar 'gyur// dmyal ba yi dgas byol song du// lha ma yin dang lus srul po// gnod sbyin srin po gtum po yang // yang dang
14a5(mdo sde): yang ni 'dir skye'o/ / mi gyur dka' byed thob pa dag/ gal te ji ltar thob na yang // smad pa'i gdol pa rnams dang ni// 'on pa long ba zhar ba dang // rtag tu nad dang nyam chung ba// skur pa
14a6(mdo sde): 'debs shing mchod pa med/ / zas dang skom dang bral ba ste// mkhas pa rnams kyis smad par 'gyur// pha dang ma la bskur sti med// nyes par byas pa rtag tu spyod// sems can rnams la
14a7(mdo sde): snying rje med/ / ngan 'gror yang ni 'gro bar 'gyur// 'dir ni rab tu song ba yi// dge slong drug cu tsam 'di dag/ yid kyis rtog pa zhe sdang ba// ngan 'gror yang ni myur du 'gro// lus dbang byas
14b1(mdo sde): pa'i sems can 'di/ / gang gis bzod pa 'di bstan cing // thabs la mngon sum ma yin pa// des ni dge slong de song ngo // ye shes thabs dang ldan pa dang // pha rol sems la lta ba yin//
14b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten la ni sgron 'dzin pa// sems can kun la phan par smra// thams cad don gyi rjes shes pa// thog mar yang ni 'khor ltos la// ci 'drar 'gyur ba'i 'khor rnams la// de 'drar bar ni
14b3(mdo sde): chos kyang shod/ de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po ches 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu ji lta bur nyan thos kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri ba shams
14b4(mdo sde): nyan thos 'dul ba'i phyir smra bar 'gyur ro zhes bdag gis yongs su shes so/ / rigs kyi bu yang 'dis sngon ma thos pa yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa
14b5(mdo sde): bstan pa na/ yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ji lta bur bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa yon tan gyis dmigs pa sbyor ba
14b6(mdo sde): rgyachen pos bshad par bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba gdab cing / bdag dang sems can gzhan la yang thugs brtse ba'i slad du rjes su gzung bar 'gyur snyam mo//
14b7(mdo sde): nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na mar mes byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po che la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu gang gi dus la bab par shes/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'
15a1(mdo sde): lag na mar me stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te phyag byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la
15a2(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ / thub pa tshangs pa rab tu dga' mdzad pa// ye shes nyams pa'i 'gro la sgron ma 'dzin// grol dang rig la khyod ni dang
15a3(mdo sde): bar mdzad/ / rdul dang bral ba'i chos kyi sgo 'di ston// rgyal ba nyi ma 'gro la mar me mdzad// sems can du ma la ni snang mdzad pa// lam rnams rab stor lam ni khyod ston pa// mchog gi
15a4(mdo sde): chos kyi sgo 'di bstan par mdzod/ / nam mkha'i rang bzhin yongs su dag pa'i thugs// thugs dam mi g.yo ji ltar ri brtan bzhin// thub pa 'jig rten zla ba'i 'od 'dra ba// tshul mdog bzod
15a5(mdo sde): pa'i dge ba 'di yang ston/ / snying rje gnas shing 'gro la bzod mdzad pa// khyod kyi cho ga shes pa ni mchog tu che// rga shi nad gsum rab tu zhi mdzad pa// bzod pa mchog gi yon tan 'di yang ston/
15a6(mdo sde): thub pa seng ge mu stegs 'jig par mdzad// 'gro ba dga' mdzad ka la bing+ga'i skad// mu stegs can gyi 'khor mangs rnam 'jig pa// mar me'i bzod pa 'di yang bstan par mdzod// sa dang
15a7(mdo sde): mnyam pa bzod pa mchog gi thugs/ / bde dang sdug bsngal reg la khro mi mdzad// mthon po ma yin da ltar mthong min pa// yongs smin gzigs te bzod pa 'di yang gsungs// ye shes mchog
15b1(mdo sde): gis nga yi nga rgyal gyi/ / rlung langs lta bu'i nyon mongs dgra yang gtor// des ni bzod pa'i dam pa 'di thob pa// lam gyi mi yis srid pa'i chu yang bskams// khyod kyis lta ba lcug ma sred tu
15b2(mdo sde): tshig/ klu lta bur ni chos kyi char gtong ba// des ni 'khor 'di dga' bar gyur pa ste// yongs su smin pa gzigs shing bzod 'di gsungs// sems can rnams la rnam grol yon tan skyed// bzod
15b3(mdo sde): pa mchog gi yon tan 'di ston cing / / bdag gi bsam pa dri ma med bzod 'gyur// de thob pa yi yon tan 'di mtha' yas// spyod yul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba yi// thub pas 'das
15b4(mdo sde): pa'i bzod pa 'di gsungs dang / / da ltar gyi'ang bzod pa 'di gsungs pa// thugs rjer dgongs khyod bzod pa 'di yang gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rin chen lag
15b5(mdo sde): nacang mi gsung bas zhal gyis bzhes so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
15b6(mdo sde): de gang na yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa bstan par nga yang dgongs so snyam/ lha bran gyis gsol pa/ spos kyi ngang ldan pa'i ri la sngon yang dag par
15b7(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ bzod pa 'di bstan nas ji lta bu spos kyi ngad ldan pa'i ri la sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ yang dag par spong pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis
16a1(mdo sde): 'dul ba'i bzod pa 'di bshad par 'gyur ro zhes/ bcom ldan 'das bdag nyid ye shes bstan pa la 'jug go// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das skar mda'i
16a2(mdo sde): bdag po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ting nge 'dzin des bcom ldan 'das drang srong gi brtul zhugs dang / spyod lam dang / mtshan ma dang / dbyibs kun tu snang ste/ drang
16a3(mdo sde): srong de yang rgan po dang / rgas pa dang / 'khogs pa dang / skra ril pa'i ral pa 'chang ba dang / ag tsom ring po dang / dbyug pa dang / ril ba dang / gtsang ma 'dzin me'i sbyin sreg chen
16a4(mdo sde): po 'bar ba byed do/ / de las kyang 'od kyi phung po kha dog sna tshogs dang / kha dog mtha' yas pa dang / kha dog brgya stong du ma dang / kha dog rgya chen po shin tu yongs su dag pa dri ma med pa'i
16a5(mdo sde): 'od 'byung ngo / / de'i 'od snang bas phyogs bcu'i stong pa dang / rnyog pa lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas mu med pa'i skar ma dang / rin po che dang / glog dang / 'od dang / lha dang klu dang
16a6(mdo sde): gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin gyi 'od kyang mi mngon mi snang ngo // sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song dang / yi dgas kyi lta ba yang mi mngon mi snang ngo // de'i tshe drang srong thub pa ma gtogs par
16a7(mdo sde): sems can rnams kyi sgra dang / brjod pa dang / dbyangs dang tshig dang / yi ge dang / chung ngu nas dang / chu dang me dang / rlung gi sgra yang mi grag go// de'i tshe na phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
16b1(mdo sde): mtha' yas mu med pa na/ sems can gang la la theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa de dag thams cad dang drang srong gi brtul zhugs dang / lus dang mtshan ma dang / dbyibs kun tu snang ngo //
16b2(mdo sde): yang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i drang srong ma gtogs par/ nyan thos sam/ nyan thos dang / rang rgyal ba'i theg pa pa'i drang srong ni kun tu mi snang ngo // yang theg pa chen po la yang dag par
16b3(mdo sde): zhugs pa'i drang srong des/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas mi mthong zhing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa yang mi mthong ngo // de'i tshe na gang yang nyan thos 'khor der 'dug pa des de bzhin
16b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa mi mthong zhing de byang chub sems dpa' yang yang dag par mi mthong ngo / / gang yang 'dir 'dug 'dug pa 'dus par gyur pa gzhan du na cung zad gzugs snang ba'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong
16b5(mdo sde): snang ba rgya chen pos ni 'jig rten thams cad khyab par yang dag par rjes mi mthong ngo / / de nas nyan thos chen po des kun shes ko'u 'di n+ya la smras pa/ gnas brtan ko'u 'di n+ya bcom
16b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das gang na/ ko'u di rgyas smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang na ba zhes bya ba ni mi shes so// mi mthong ngo // de nas nyan thos chen po des 'od srungs chen po la smras pa/
16b7(mdo sde): sbyangs pa smra ba'i nang na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod mchog tu bstan na/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang na bsoms shig/ 'od srungs chen pos smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang na zhes bya ba
17a1(mdo sde): mi shes so/ / mi mthong ngo // de nas nyan thos chen po des/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la smras pa/ gnas brtan shA ri'i bu shes rab dang ldan pa'i nang na
17a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod mchog tu bstan na/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba soms shig/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' med pas/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar
17a3(mdo sde): gang na zhes bya ba mi shes so/ / mi mthong ngo // de nas nyan thos chen po des/ mo'u 'gal ya na la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal ya na rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i nang na bcom ldan
17a4(mdo sde): 'das kyis khyod kyang mchog tu bstan na/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang na ba soms shig/ mo'u 'gal ya nas smras pa/ gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen pos smras pa/ de nyid na bdag gis stong
17a5(mdo sde): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis rjes su shes kyi/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang na bzhugs pa gang du bzhud ces bya ba ni mi mthong ngo // mi shes so//
17a6(mdo sde): de nas nyan thos chen po des tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa la smras pa/ lha'i mig gi nang na bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod kyang mchog tu bstan na/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang du bzhud/ gang na
17a7(mdo sde): gnas/ spyod pa ni ci 'dra ci 'dra bar spyod/ khyod kyi lha'i mig gis ltos// ma 'gags pas smras pa/ kho bos 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi mig gis mtha' yas mu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam
17b1(mdo sde): par bltas na/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang na bzhugs/ gang du bzhud ces bya ba bdag kyang mi shes so// mi mthong ngo // des smras pa/ yang tha dad par yang dag par shes pa thob pa'i nyan thos kyi
17b2(mdo sde): ye shes gang la'ang mi 'jug gi/ bzod pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes de la ni 'jug go// bdag gis bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang du bzhud/ gang na bzhugs zhes byang chub sems dpa'
17b3(mdo sde): la dri snyam pa dang / de nas nyan thos chen po des/ byang chub sems dpa' gcig kyang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa 'di la
17b4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu gzhan zhig gis/ phung po bshad par byas pa de na/ dge slong drug cu tsam po stan las langs te dong bas/ tshe dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das thugs mi dgyes nas btang snyoms shing
17b5(mdo sde): 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi spyod pas rig kyi bu dang thabs gcig tu spyod do/ / bdag cag ni rang rang gi spyil por zhugs shing / bsam gtan bya snyam ste/ de nas nyan thos chen po de dag rang rang gi spyil
17b6(mdo sde): por zhugs nas bsam gtan byed do/ / de nas de'i tshe de'i dus na/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med grangs med pa na/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems
17b7(mdo sde): can de/ bdag drang srong gi cha byad du mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te bdag cag drang srong du gyur pa na/ gang drang srong las shin tu khyad par 'phags pa ste/ bdag cag gi mkhan por gzung
18a1(mdo sde): ngo zhes/ bdag cag rnam par blta bar bya'o// snyam pa de dag thams cad rnyog pa sel ba zhes bya ba byed pa can gyi grong rdal na/ drang srong chen po shAkya thub pa rgas pa 'khogs pa
18a2(mdo sde): gtugs pa'i rnams pas/ me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / sman dang / zas dang / skom rnam pa sna tshogs kyis me la gtor ba thag mi ring bar mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ drang srong chen po
18a3(mdo sde): 'di nus pa chen po mthu chen po 'di'i mthus snang ba chen po 'byung ngo / / drang srong 'di gang na ba de logs su nye bar 'gro zhing / drang srong gi brtul zhugs dang / spyod pa'i rjes su bslab par bya'o/
18a4(mdo sde): snyam mo// // bam po gnyis pa/ de nas de'i tshe de'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa' drang srong bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du/
18a5(mdo sde): nye bar dong ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' drang srong ting nge 'dzin dang / bzod pa dang / bzung dbang du byas pa de sems rtse gcig pa'i stobs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i
18a6(mdo sde): las kyi phyir/ brtson pa de nyid kyi tshe mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir gang lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen
18a7(mdo sde): po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa la la theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa de thams cad drang srong gi cha byad kyis/ drang srong shAkya thub pa'i thang du der nye bar dong ngo // 'khor thams cad dang ldan
18b1(mdo sde): pa de/ bcom ldan 'das ji lta bur spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i ri la bzhud nas/ de na yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa 'di ston pa'i phyir/ chos can dang chos kyi
18b2(mdo sde): 'khor lo gnyis la yang 'jug par bzhed pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs sems kyis shes so/ / bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi don gyi phyir/ lam brgyan pa sbyang bar bya zhing / lam nges
18b3(mdo sde): drang srong gi mchog spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i ri la nye bar 'gro bar bya'o snyam ste/ de nas klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / bsnyen dga' bo dang / rgya mtsho dang / nor na dog dang / 'jog po dang / yid 'ong
18b4(mdo sde): la sogs pa/ klu'i rgyal po bye ba phrag cu drug cu tsam lhan cig tu drang srong gi cha byad kyis/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shel dang / byi ru dang / a sma gar pa dang
18b5(mdo sde): mu sa ra gal pa la sogs pa rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ta la'i 'phreng ba gser gyi shing la dngul gyi lo ma dang me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / dngul gyi shing la gser gyi lo ma dang / me tog dang /
18b6(mdo sde): 'bras bu nas/ mu sa ra gal ba'i shing gi bar du rin po che sna bdun gyi lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu'i 'phreng ba'i rgyan gyis lam de brgyan par sprul to// shing ta la'i 'phreng ba de la lha rdzas
18b7(mdo sde): kyi gos stong phrag bye ba rnam pa du ma rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par rab tu 'phyang ngo / / lha de dag kyang drang srong gi cha byad kyis dka' thub kyi gnas nas/ spos kyi ngang ldang ba'i bar du lam gyi zheng dpag
19a1(mdo sde): tshang bcu pa sbyangs so/ / lam gyi mu gnyis su lha rdzas kyi gseb nas mu sa ra gal ba'i bar du rin po che sna bdun gyi stegs bur sprul to// gser gyi shing ta la dngul gyi
19a2(mdo sde): snying po 'phyang ba nas/ mu sa ra gal ba'i bar du smra bar bya'o// 'og logs su bai DUR+Ya bzang po nas gong logs kyi gnas su shel gyi bar du/ rgya chen pos smra bar bya'o// sprin gyi lha'i bu drang srong gi cha
19a3(mdo sde): byad kyis/ lam gyi mu gnyis su rdzing rnyog pa med pa rin po che sna bdun gyi them skas can gyi rdzing de dag la gser gyi bye ma gdal ba/ rdzing de dag la yang lha rdzas kyi me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu
19a4(mdo sde): da dang / puN+Da ri ka dang / a ti mu ta ka dang / tsam pa ka dang / a sho ka dang / mu tsu kun da dang / man dzu sha ka dang / pa da li dang / pa ri sha ka 'gan da nub ska ri dang / su ma ra dang / a mra dang / 'dzam
19a5(mdo sde): bu dang / mrin la dang / mchog tu dri zhim pa rnam pa sna tshogs su mngon par sprul to// sa bla rnam gyi gnod sbyin drang srong gi cha byad kyis lam sbyor bar byed do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu yang drang srong
19a6(mdo sde): go cha byad kyi lam gyi mu gnyis la lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyal mtshan mchog 'dzin to/ / rgyal mtshan gyi mchog de dag la lha rdzas kyi gos dang / du sha dang / rgyan rab tu 'phyang ngo // 'phrul dga'i lha'i
19a7(mdo sde): bu yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis lha rdzas rin po che sna bdun gyi khang bu brtsegs ma mngon par sprul to/ / khang bu brtsegs ma de dag gi phyogs bzhi kun tu rin po che sna bdun bgyis so// khang bu brtsegs ma de la yang
19b1(mdo sde): lha rdzas kyi du sha sna tshogs byung ngo / / gos sna tshogs dang / rgyan sna tshogs mngon par rab tu 'phyang ngo // me tog sna tshogs kyis kun tu gtor to// khang bu brtsegs ma de la lha rdzas kyi rol mo rgya chen po yid du 'ong
19b2(mdo sde): ba sna tshogs byung ngo / / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi rol mo dkrol ba dang / glu'i sgra bsgrags pa des/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad sgras khyab par gyur to// klu'i
19b3(mdo sde): bu mo brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad lam mdzes pas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ drang srong gi rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi char phab bo// dga' ldan
19b4(mdo sde): lha'i bu brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis 'di lta ste/ lha rdzas kyi me tog man+da ra ba dang / man+da ra ba chen po dang / tsam pa ka dang / pa ri ya ta dang / 'dzo sha dang / 'dzo sha ka chen po dang / ro tsa dang / ro tsa ka chen
19b5(mdo sde): po dang / bal la dang / bal la chen po dang / tsakra dang / tsakra chen po'i 'od dri ma med pa/ 'dab ma brgya pa/ 'dab ma stong pa/ 'dab ma brgya stong pa/ kun nas 'od/ kun nas dri kun nas rnam par rgyu ba'i dri
19b6(mdo sde): rtag tu me tog 'od snang ba/ kha dog mtha' med pa/ bltar 'os pa/ mig gis mngon par dga' ba/ rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi don dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis mchod pa'i las kyi phyir lam de mdzes
19b7(mdo sde): par byas so/ / char pa'i sprin gyi lha'i bu brgya stong du ma dag kyang drang srong gi cha byad kyis chu las skyes pa dang / thang las skyes pa'i me tog gi char rab tu phab bo// klu'i dbang po brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis
20a1(mdo sde): yang dag par gnas shing 'di lta ste/ mu tig sngon po'i char dang / go shir sha'i snying po'i char la sogs te/ char sna tshogs rab tu phab bo// gang la la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
20a2(mdo sde): gyi khams 'dir sngon byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i lha 'am/ lha'i dbang po 'am/ klu 'am/ klu'i dbang po nas/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen
20a3(mdo sde): po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / grul bum dang / grul bum gyi dbang po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba'i bar du de thams cad drang srong gi cha byad kyis me tog sna tshogs dang / 'phreng
20a4(mdo sde): ba sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs dang / byug pa sna tshogs dang / rol mo dkrol ba sna tshogs dang / brdung ba dang / glu sna tshogs yongs su bzung nas/ bcom ldan 'das spyan mi 'dzum pa'i zhal la rnam
20a5(mdo sde): par blta ba'i phyir 'khod do/ / gang la la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir lha'i bu mo 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi bu mo 'am/ nam mkha' lding gi bu mo 'am/ lha ma yin gyi bu mo 'am/ mi 'am ci'i
20a6(mdo sde): bu mo 'am/ lto 'phye chen po'i bu mo de thams cad drang srong gi cha byad kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ rol mo brdung ba dang / dkrol ba dang / glu yongs su bzung ste/ dmar po dang / dkar po
20a7(mdo sde): dang le brgan dang / shel gyi kha dog gi gos kyi char khad kyis rab tu phab bo// mi 'am ci'i bu mo brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis bcom ldan 'dal mchod pa sna tshogs kyi las kyis phyir brtson no//
20b1(mdo sde): tshangs pa'i dbang po sngon byang chub tu sems bskyed pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis bcom ldan 'das la bstod cing spyan sngar 'khod do// brgya byin gyi dbang po brgya stong du ma yang drang srong
20b2(mdo sde): gi cha byad kyis phyag 'tshal bar byed cing / mi 'am ci'i dbang po brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis bstod cing phyag 'tshal lo// dri za'i dbang po brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis rab tu gsal
20b3(mdo sde): ba'i sems kyis zhal la rnam par blta'o/ / klu'i dbang po brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis dus dang mthun pa'i tsan dan gyi phye ma'i char chen po rab tu 'bebs so// lha ma yin gyi dbang po brgya
20b4(mdo sde): stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis phyogs bzhir rlung mchog tu 'jam pas kun tu reg pa mchog tu dri zhim pa/ mchog tu 'jam pa gtong ngo // gnod sbyin gyi dbang po brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad
20b5(mdo sde): kyis me tog gi gdugs 'dzin to/ / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po brgya stong du ma drang srong rgan por gyur nas/ gser gyi dbyug pa'i gdugs 'dzin cing / bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas logs su 'khod do//
20b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin du blta'o// grul bum brgya stong du ma yang drang srong rgan por cha byad kyis/ gser gyi dbyugs pa'i gdugs 'chang zhing / bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon logs su 'khod de/ bcom
20b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das la de bzhin du blta'o/ / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis/ nam mkha'i dkyil du gser gyi 'phreng ba 'phyang bar gyur to// lha'i bu mo brgya stong du ma yang
21a1(mdo sde): drang srong gi cha byad kyis/ me tog gi chu bo'i char chen po mngon par rab tu 'bebs so// klu'i bu mo brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis/ mu tig dmar po'i char
21a2(mdo sde): mngon par rab tu 'bebs so/ / dri za'i bu mo brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis/ mu tig dkar po'i char mngon par rab tu 'bebs so// gnod sbyin gyi bu mo brgya stong du ma yang drang srong
21a3(mdo sde): gi cha byad kyis tsan dan gyi phye ma'i char mngon par rab tu 'bebs so/ / lha ma yin gyi bu mo brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis rgyan gyi char mngon par rab tu 'bebs so// nam mkha' lding gi bu
21a4(mdo sde): mo brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi char mngon par rab tu 'bebs so/ / lte 'phye chen po'i bu mo brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis/ nam mkha'i dkyil
21a5(mdo sde): rgyan par byed do/ / sa'i gnod sbyin brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis dbyangs gtong bar byed do// bar snang gi gnod sbyin brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis na mkha' la 'byin to//
21a6(mdo sde): bdud brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis/ lhung lhung ldegs kyi sgra 'byin pa la 'jug go// drang srong lha brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi rang bzhin gyis brtan pa'i brtul zhugs yang dag par spyod
21a7(mdo sde): ba dang / drang srong stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi rang bzhin gyis brtan pa'i brtul zhugs yang dag par spyod pa dag lha rdzas kyi me tog man+da ra ba chen po blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi don gyi phyir
21b1(mdo sde): rnyog pa sel ba nas spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i ri'i bar du mtshams sbyor ba rab tu byin no/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das bzhud pa'i zhabs kyis/ me tog gi snying po kun tu gnon par 'gyur ro//
21b2(mdo sde): lha'i bu nyi ma dang zla ba brgya stong phrag du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis/ me tog gi chu bo'i cher mngon par rab tu 'bebs so// dri za bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis rol mo
21b3(mdo sde): dkrol bas/ zang srong thub pa'i sku la 'od gzer bye ba brgya stong 'byung ngo // de nas lha'i bu yon tan can zhes bya ba spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i ri la gnas pa/ lha bran brgya stong phrag
21b4(mdo sde): brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang lhan cig du drang srong gi cha byad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das gang na bde logs su thal mo sbyar te/ phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mgrin gcig tu tshigs su bcad pa
21b5(mdo sde): 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ / sems can mi bsrun grol byed rkang gnyis mchog/ mnyes dka' rgyal ba gzugs ngan 'dren mdzad cing // sdug bsngal gzir la bde ba'i mchog sbyin pa//
21b6(mdo sde): rgyal ba rkang gnyis dam pa 'dir gshegs gsol// sred pa rab spangs rnam thar gsum ston cing // 'gro la dus gsum nang na ye shes kyis// bslab pa gsum ston dri ma gsum spangs pa/
21b7(mdo sde): khams gsum las 'das thub pa 'dir gshegs gsol// 'gro la phyin ci log bzhi rnam pa grol// 'khor bzhi dag gis zhabs la snyen bkur cing // 'gro la 'phags pa'i bden bzhi rab ston/
22a1(mdo sde): pa/ zla ba pas kyang lhag pa 'dir gshegs gsol// thub pa phung po lnga 'dir ba ston pa// 'dod pa lnga las skye bo rnams grol zhing // 'phags pa'i shes rab yan lag
22a2(mdo sde): lnga ston pa/ / 'gro ba lnga yi btson ra rnam par dkrol// dbang po drug tu gnas bskyon med cing // sred lus drug la shin tu rnam grol shes// sum cu rtsa drug dran ston sems can mchog
22a3(mdo sde): spos kyi ngad ldang ri 'dir gshegs su gsol/ / rgyal ba mnyam gzhag rab tu dul ba'i thugs// shin tu bsgoms pa byang chub dam pa mchog/ ye shes sems can bye ba rab dul mdzad//
22a4(mdo sde): kha lo rab sgyur spos ngad ri 'dir spron// rgyal ba ye shes sems can rab ston pa// ye shes kyis ni 'jig rten snang mdzad nas// khyod ni mun pas bsgribs la ye shes ston// thub pa dgon
22a5(mdo sde): pa'i gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol/ / 'dzam bu gling 'dir sangs rgyas byung ba dag/ 'di la sngon gyur la la thar 'dod cing // mi yi dbang po byang chub 'dir thob pa// mi yi 'dren mkhan//
22a6(mdo sde): khyod ni 'dir gshegs gsol// sbyin dang 'dul ba stong zhing dul ba'i thugs// sems can nang na gtso bo stobs bcu'i mchog/ sems can dbul la gnyen pa 'phags pa khyod// spos kyi
22a7(mdo sde): ngad ldang ri 'dir gshegs su gsol/ / bar 'ga' khyod kyis lo drug dka' mdzad cing // bar 'ga' rgyal ba bdud phyir shing la bzhugs// dpa' bo tshul gcig tu ni lam ston pa// thub
22b1(mdo sde): pa 'dir gshegs bzod pa rab tu ston/ / wa ra NA sir 'khor longam pa bskor// shes rab dam bdag gi mdzod cig gsungs// 'jig rten thams cad 'di la khur bor ba/ spos kyi ngang
22b2(mdo sde): ljang ri 'dir bzod pa gsungs/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha du mas mdun du bdar cing / byang chub sems dpa' du mas bskor nas/ gdan las bzhengs pa dang de nyid
22b3(mdo sde): kyi tshe na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lan drug tu rab tu g.yos so// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir gang sems can nyan thos sam
22b4(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'am/ gang yang sems can gzhan thams cad gang nam mkha' la rgyu ba 'am/ gangs la rgyu ba 'am
22b5(mdo sde): gang chu la rgyu ba de thams cad dran pa rgya chen po so sor thob bo/ / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi kham 'di lag mthil du skyes pa snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par mthong ngo // mig gis
22b6(mdo sde): gzugs la ni cung zad kyang snang bar mi 'gyur ro/ / gang yang sems can dka' thub ngan pa'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pa de yang ngo mtshar chen po thob bo// 'di lta ste// me'i brtul zhugs can dang / zla ba'i brtul
22b7(mdo sde): zhugs can dang / nyi ma'i brtul zhugs can dang / 'jig rten gsum gyi brtul zhugs can dang / de la sogs pa'i sems can gang la la lta ba nyam nga ba rnam pa sna tshogs thob pa/ log pa la lta ba can/
23a1(mdo sde): de thams cad dka' thub ngan pa spangs nas/ phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su bltas so// ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis na rnam pa de bu'i sa g.yo ba 'di dang / snang ba chen po
23a2(mdo sde): 'di 'jig rten du byung bar 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das drang srong chen po'i spyan snga na/ gang me'i phung po chen po 'dug pa de yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam du mngon par sprul te/ phyogs bcu'i
23a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa dang / rnam par ma dag pa tshad med grangs med pa rnams su gtor to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag bzhugs te 'tsho skyong ba'i
23a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas de dag gi spyan sngar mer snang ba de/ me tog man+da ra ba chen por kun tu gnas pa 'dug par gyur to// 'khor ji tsam pa 'dus pa dang / gang sngon byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de thams cad
23a5(mdo sde): zang srong gi cha byad kyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi spyan sngar 'khod do// shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing chu bo gang+gA gnyis kyi bye ma snyed las shin tu 'das te/
23a6(mdo sde): de na rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der/ de bzhin gshegs pa dbang gi rgyal mtshan gyi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho skyong ba chos kyang ston to// de na de bzhin gshegs
23a7(mdo sde): ba dbang gi rgyal mtshan gyi 'khor de las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dpal zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bza' shing gi ra ba'i dpal zhes bya
23b1(mdo sde): ba de drang srong gi gzugs dang / lus dang dbyibs kyis bdag mthong ngo // gzhan yang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu thams cad drang srong gi gzugs dang lus dang /
23b2(mdo sde): dbyibs kyis mthong ngo // mthong nas de bzhin gshegs pa dbang gi rgyal mtshan gying bal la yongs su zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis na/ gang me tog mer snang ba be
23b3(mdo sde): dbyig pa 'di bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur/ theg pa chen po 'di dag la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu de thams cad zang srong gi cha byad 'dzin par grub/
23b4(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dbang gi rgyal mtshan gyi dpal gyis/ rigs kyi bu de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
23b5(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba nub phyogs kyi mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na 'dug cing / rnyog pa lnga'i 'jig rten du 'jug pa na/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang /
23b6(mdo sde): dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma 'khor bzhi dag la theg pa gsum gyi chos ston par byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa de da ltar yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa
23b7(mdo sde): bstan par 'dod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa sgron ma dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par sprul to// gsol pa/ bzod pa 'di'i thog
24a1(mdo sde): ma'am/ tha ma'am/ ji lta bu zhig/ bka' stsal pa/ bzod pa 'di ni mu stegs can thams cad la 'jug pa'o// de ltar mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der/
24a2(mdo sde): sems can chu bo bzhis khyer ba rnams las sgrol bar byed pa'o// chu bo bzhi gang zhe na/ 'dod pa'i chu bo dang / lta ba'i chu bo dang / srid pa'i chu bo dang / ma rig pa'i chu bo 'di
24a3(mdo sde): dag las sems can sgrol bar byed pa'o/ / dad pa mi phyed pa bzhi yang dag par len du 'jug pa/ 'jug par byed pa/ so sor dgod par byed pa'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas la dad pa
24a4(mdo sde): mi phyed pa/ sems can rnams yang dag par len du 'jug pa/ 'jug par byed pa/ so sor dgod par byed pa'o// bsdu ba'i dngos po rnam bzhi la sems can rnams sbyor byed pa'o//
24a5(mdo sde): tshul khrims kyi phung pos sems can rnams 'dod pa'i chu bo las sgrol bar byed pa'o// ting nge 'dzin gyi phung pos sems can rnams lta ba'i chu bo las sgrol bar byed pa'o// shes rab kyi phung
24a6(mdo sde): bos sems can rnams ma rig pa'i chu bo las sgrol bar byed pa'o/ / rnam par grol ba'i phung pos sems can rnams srid pa'i chu bo las sgrol bar byed pa'o// sangs rgyas la dad pa mi phyed pas
24a7(mdo sde): sems can rnams theg pa chen pos sgrol bar byed pa'o/ / chos la dad pa mi phyed pas/ sems can rnams rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas sgrol bar byed pa'o// dge ba'adun la dad pa mi phyed pas/
24b1(mdo sde): sems can rnams nyan thos kyi theg pas sgrol bar byed pa'o// 'phags pa yid du 'ong ba'i tshul khrims kyis lta bar song ba thams cad spong ba la ston par byed pa'o// sbyin pas sems can rnams/
24b2(mdo sde): tshe'i rgya mtsho las sgrol bar byed pa'o// ngag snyan pas lta ba'i rgya mtsho las sgrol bar byed pa'o// don bya bas sems can rnams nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho las sgrol bar byed pa'o// don mthun pas
24b3(mdo sde): sems can rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu sgrol bar byed pa'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la bka' stsal du gsol/ de bzhin gshegs
24b4(mdo sde): pa shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba'i phyir bdag cag nye bar mchi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang gi rgyal mtshan gyi dpal des yang rigs kyi bu gang gi dus la
24b5(mdo sde): dbab par shes na zhes bka' stsal pa dang / de nas rigs kyi bu ye shes dpal dang / bza shing gi ra ba'i dpal de gnyis dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag drug tu ldan
24b6(mdo sde): cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dbang gi rgyal mtshan gyi dpal de la/ zang srong gi cha byad kyis rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ g.yas phyogs nas bskor ba byas
24b7(mdo sde): te 'khod do/ / skad cig ma gcig tsam gyis mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das drang srong shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal
25a1(mdo sde): 'khod par gyur to/ / de la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' tshad med grangs med pa rnams drang srong gi cha byad kyis/ shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa dang
25a2(mdo sde): rnam par ma dag pa tshad med grangs med pa 'dir skad cig ma gcig gis lhags so/ / de bzhin du lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing chu bo gang+gA'i bye ma skyed las shin tu 'das
25a3(mdo sde): te/ de na rirab kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab chen po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho skyong ba chos kyang ston to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems
25a4(mdo sde): dpa' mngon par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' klog gi mchog ces bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis drang srong gi cha byad dang / lus dang gzugs dang / dbye bra
25a5(mdo sde): kyis bdag mthong ngo / / sngon ma byung ba'i thub pa chen po gzhan yang drang srong gi cha byad kyis mthong nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab chen po de la yongs su zhus pa de bzhin du ji lta bur gong du
25a6(mdo sde): bshad pa nas/ de bzhin du nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di las shin tu 'das pa'i bar du ste/ de na 'dus pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der de bzhin gshegs pa dpal snang ba
25a7(mdo sde): zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho skyong ba chos kyang ston to// de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod par mthong ba dang / ku mu da'i glang po zhes bya ba gnyis kyang ji ltar gong du bshad pa
25b1(mdo sde): gnas/ byang phyogs kyis ras rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing chu bo gang+gA gsum gyi bye ma snyed las shin tu 'das pa'i bar du ste/ den rgyan gcig ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der/
25b2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pargyan po che zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho skyong ba chos kyang ston to// de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdul dang bral ba'i 'od dang / tshangs pa'i 'od ces bya
25b3(mdo sde): ba gnyis kyang ji ltar gong du bshad pa nas/ 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du chu bo gang+gA gcig gi bye ma snyed las shin tu 'das pa'i bar du ste/ de nas me
25b4(mdo sde): tog chen po zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der/ de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi rgyal mtshan chen po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho skyong ba chos kyang ston to// de na byang chub sems dpa' ye
25b5(mdo sde): shes dpal zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' dpal chen po zhes bya ba gnyis kyang ji ltar gong du bshad pa nas/ yang steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing chu bo
25b6(mdo sde): gang+gA bdun gyi bye ma snyed nas shin tu 'das pa'i bar du ste/ de na 'od snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
25b7(mdo sde): ma'i snying po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho skyong ba chos kyang ston to// de na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyangs dang / bdud rtsi dbyangs shes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gnyis kyang ji
26a1(mdo sde): snyed gong du bshad pa bzhin no/ / de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' drang srong gi cha byad 'dzin pas mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang ldan pa 'di kun tu rgyas nas
26a2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs badrang srong chen po shAkya thub pa gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas 'khod do/ / mi mjed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sems can gang la la theg pa chen po la
26a3(mdo sde): yang dag par ma zhugs pa ni/ drang srong gi cha byad kyis ma gyur pa'o// rgyan de dag la nyan thos sam/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa bas
26a4(mdo sde): kyang mi mthong na/ sems can gzhan gyis mthong bar mi 'gyur ba lta ci smos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das drang srong chen po gdan de las bzhengs te thub pa dbang po'i 'gros
26a5(mdo sde): dang / tshangs pa dbang po'i 'gros dang / tshangs pa drang srong gi 'gros dang / mnya' shing du blta ba'i 'gros dang / nye bar zhi ba'i 'gros dang / rab tu zhi ba'i 'gros dang
26a6(mdo sde): dge slong rnams mos pa chen po'i 'gros dang / lha dga' ba'i 'gros dang / gnod sbyin dul ba'i 'gros dang / lha ma yin dga' bar byed pa'i 'gros dang / klu dul ba'i 'gros dang
26a7(mdo sde): rgyal ba nyon mongs pa med pa'i 'gros dang / rnam par grol ba'i 'gros ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i 'gros su bzhud cing / sangs rgyas chen po rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'gros dang / rgya chen po'i
26b1(mdo sde): 'gros dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs chen po'i 'gros su bcom ldan 'das spros kyi ngad ldang ba'i ri la me tog gi ze ba la zhabs 'deg pa dang / 'dor bas bzhud nas spod kyi ngang
26b2(mdo sde): ldang ba'i ril byon to/ / dka' thub kyi gnas gtsang ma dri tha dad pa med cing / dri ma med pa'i phyogs su 'gro sel gyi lha mo chen mo 'od 'dres pa zhes bya ba gang na bden/ bcom ldan 'das bzhugs
26b3(mdo sde): te/ glang po'i rnam par lta ba'i tshul gyis rnam par bltas par gyur pa de'i dus na yang 'di brjod do// la la gang 'dir brtan dang ldan pa la// byang chub dam pa mchog tu sems skyed pa// bdag
26b4(mdo sde): gis yang dag spyod pa bstan pa'i phyir/ / de dag thams cad bdag gi mdun du 'ong // byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs spangs me gang // da dung du yang 'khor ba'i bde 'dod cing // chos
26b5(mdo sde): la bdag med rab tu mi shes pa/ / bdag ni de dag thams cad 'ong na ston// kun tu sbyor ba spangs med gang dag kyang // sgyu ma'i phung ltar shin tu sngon mthong zhing // thabs la mkhas par
26b6(mdo sde): yang ni mi shes pa/ / de dag thams cad 'ong na bdag ston to// brtson 'grus ldan pa bsod nams mdzod mang po// thabs la mkhas pas sems can rnams 'dul zhing // shes rab/
26b7(mdo sde): ngarom byin mchog tag spyong pa// bzod can mas phyir dag thams cad 'ong / gang gis sangs rgyas du ma sngon bsnyen bsung // 'dus byas thams cad 'di la rten pa med// chum
27a1(mdo sde): lta bur rab tu su ston pa/ / rang bzhin rnam par 'jug pa 'dir yang 'ong // gang rnams thabs dang yang dag spyod phyir zhugs// thams cad dngos la sems pa rten med cing /
27a2(mdo sde): mtshan ma spangs la rtog par 'gyur med pa// dran par byed pa dag ni 'dir yang 'ong // bdag gis bzod pa mchog 'di rab bstan nas// ji ltar sdug bsngal kun la mi gnas pa// chos kyi 'khor
27a3(mdo sde): lo la yang khyod myur 'jug/ srid mtsho las kyang sems can rab thar byed// phyogs bcur thub pa'i dbang po gang dag kyang // 'gro ba rnam la phan phyir 'khor lo bskor// da dung theg pa'i
27a4(mdo sde): dam tshigs gang 'dod pa/ / bdag gi gan du byang chub sems dpa' mthong // lan gnyis su yang 'khor lo bdag bskor te// phyir mi ldog pa sems can bye bkod pa// rnam par grol ba'i
27a5(mdo sde): blo mtshan rab thogs shing / / bdag bdag zhing rnams su yang 'gro bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas zhing 'dir 'ongs pa gang dag kyang // byang chub mchog gi spyod phyir bzod pa bstan// nyan thos rang
27a6(mdo sde): rgyal theg pa can mthong ste/ / de bas mu stegs gzhan kun 'dir 'dul lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor de yang de ltar bcom 'das kyi yi ge dang don dang / tshig brjod
27a7(mdo sde): pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas mu med par song ngo / / de na sems can gang la la theg pa chen po yang dag par zhugs bde thams cad nyan cing de phyogs
27b1(mdo sde): bcur yang lta bar 'gyur ro/ / bdag cag gis blta ba'i sems can de sems can gang gi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor de ltar yid du 'ong ba de ltar dga' ba/ de ltar mngon par dga' ba/ de ltar
27b2(mdo sde): zab cing sems can gyi dbugs 'byin pa/ de ltar tshim pa de ltar 'khor ba'i pha rol tu 'gro ba/ don dang tshig dang yi ge brjod pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor de bzhin du smra bar bya ba ji lta ba der/
27b3(mdo sde): phyogs bzhi kun tu bltas te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i ri la drang srong thub pa dbang po zhi zhing / thugs zhi ba dul ba dang / zhi ba'i mchog thob pa/ gser gyi phung po ji ltar
27b4(mdo sde): 'bar ba la drang srong bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang pos mngon sum du phyag 'tshal te/ ha cang yang mi ring bar mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ drang srong 'di ni mthu chen po zang
27b5(mdo sde): srong gi 'khor chen po 'di ni snying rje chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ba zhig snyam ste/ gal te snying rje dang ldan par 'gyur ba zhig rjes su 'gro'o// drang srong gi cha byad dang / lus dang dbyibs kyis
27b6(mdo sde): bdag gi lus su gyur pa de dag mthong nas/ de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag kyang drang srong du gyur na/ drang srong chen po de la bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro'o//
27b7(mdo sde): de dag kyang sems bskyed ma thag pas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med grangs med pa las/ drang srong gi cha byad tshad med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab mtshungs pa med cing
28a1(mdo sde): dpag tu med pa chu bo gang+gA'i bye ma snyed kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir mngon par lhags so// byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshogs sna/
28a2(mdo sde): tshogs kyis drang srong thub pa la mchod pa byas nas/ drang srong thub pa gang na bde logs su thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal nas bstod de 'khod do// la la smon lam gyi dbang dang / la la ngan du spyod pa
28a3(mdo sde): rkyen gyis gang yang ngan song du skyes pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi mthus drang ba so sor thob nas/ drang srong gi cha byad kyis kun tu 'khod do// drang srong chen po thub pa'i dbang po gang na ba de logs su yang thol mo
28a4(mdo sde): sbyar te 'khod do/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros kyis tshogs mtha' yas pa'i rgyal po sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'di snyam du sems te/ shAkya thub pa bzhugs shing ji lta
28a5(mdo sde): bur 'khor yang dag par 'ong ba la yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa 'di gang na ston par 'gyur/ de nas de nyid kyi tshe na/ shar phyogs kyi na mkha'i
28a6(mdo sde): lam las khang pa brtsegs pa blta na sdug pa rin po che sna bdun gyis gang ba sna tshogs 'di lta ste dper na/ brgya byin lha'i dbang po zhes bya ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa lta bu/ bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag
28a7(mdo sde): drug cu lhags so/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros kyi tshogs mtha' yas pa'i rgyal po khang pa brtsegs pa de mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis khang pa brtsegs pa 'di lta
28b1(mdo sde): ste dper na/ tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po'i khang pa brtsegs pa dbyangs zhi ba 'di 'dra bar sprul te/ zang srong thub pa gang na bzhugs pa 'dir/ bdag bzod pa 'di bstan snyam pa dang / de nyid tshen lho phyogs
28b2(mdo sde): kyi rnam kha'i lam las khang pa brtsegs pa blta na sdug pa rin po che sna bdun gyis gang ba sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ dper na tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po'i khang pa brtsegs pa dbyangs zhi blta bu/ bye ba khrag khrig brgya
28b3(mdo sde): stong phrag drug cu lhags pa mthong nas/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros kyi tshogs mtha' yas pa'i rgyal po de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis 'di lta ste dper na/ tshangs pa chen po glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i khang
28b4(mdo sde): babartsegs bde 'dra bar mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das de na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam pa dang de nas de nyid kyi tshe na nub phyogs kyi na mkha'i lam las khang pa brtsegs pa 'di lta/
28b5(mdo sde): ste dper na/ tshangs pa glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa blta na sdug pa rin po che sna bdun gyis gang ba sna tshogs khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu lhags so// de nas byang chub sems
28b6(mdo sde): dpa' blo gros kyi tshogs mtha' yas pa'i rgyal po 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis khang pa brtsegs pa 'di lta ste/ dper na/ tshangs pa ri rab kyi 'od ces bya ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa de 'dra ba mngon par sprul te/
28b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam pa dang / de nas de nyid kyi tshe na/ byang phyogs nas na mkha'i lam las khang pa brtsegs pa blta na sdug pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyis
29a1(mdo sde): gang ba sna tshogs 'di lta ste dper na/ tshangs pa chen po ri rab kyi 'od ces bya ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa/ dor ba med pa dang ldan pa khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu lhags so//
29a2(mdo sde): de nas yang de'i tshe na khang pa brtsegs pa khrag khrig brgya stong du ma namakha' la 'khod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'di snyam du sems te/ khang pa brtsegs pa de dag tu/ bcom ldan
29a3(mdo sde): 'das kyi don gyi phyir seng ge'i khri la rnam par bltas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi don gyis phyir seng ge'i khri bshams pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa gang zhig snyam ste/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'
29a4(mdo sde): byams pas/ byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid dri ma med pa la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khang pa brtsegs pa 'di dag gang du lhags/ su'i byin gyis brlabs/ byang chub sems dpa'
29a5(mdo sde): gzi brjid dri ma med pas/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de bas na/ chos kyi sgos chags pa thams cad rgyun bcad pa'i phyir/ dpung mi sgrub kyi 'di gnyis kyi 'khor ba 'khyil ba'i sgrub
29a6(mdo sde): bopo/ rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis ni 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'o// 'di gnyis ni 'byung ba dang 'jig pa zhes bya ste/ gang mi skye mi 'byung ba de 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'i 'du shes kyang med do// de 'jig pa thams spangs
29a7(mdo sde): nas/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo// 'khor ba'i rgyun gcod pa 'di ni gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo'o// gang 'gro ba dang 'ong ba zhes bya ba 'di gnyis na 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'o// rigs kyi bu
29b1(mdo sde): gang bdag tu sgor dogs pa med pa dang / srog dang gso ba dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes pa dang / shed can dang / 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba'i 'du shes su 'jug pa med/ 'di ni gnyis su
29b2(mdo sde): med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o/ / rigs kyi bu gang skyes pa 'am/ ma skyes par rtog pa 'di ni gnyis pa'o// gang 'byung ba dang 'gog par rnam par mi rtog cing / 'gro ba dang 'ong bar dmigs
29b3(mdo sde): pa med pa dang / tha dad par bya ba med pa dang / 'gyur ba med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa 'di ni rigs kyi bu gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o// nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par
29b4(mdo sde): byang ba dang / phung po skye ba dang / 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid 'di ni gnyis pa'o// gang phung po yongs su shes shing / skye ba dang 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid spangs pa/ rlom sems thams cad bcom
29b5(mdo sde): pa/ gzugs kyi 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'di ni gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o// 'gul ba dang rlom zhing sems par rig pa 'di ni gnyis pa'o// gang tshor ba'i 'gul ba med cing rlom
29b6(mdo sde): sems med pa/ g.yo ba med cing yid la mi byed pa 'di ni/ gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgro la 'jug pa'o// rigs kyi bu gang tshor bar shes pa dang / tshor ba kun 'byung bar shes pa dang
29b7(mdo sde): tshor ba'i 'gog par shes pa dang / tshor ba 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam du shes pa 'di ni gnyis pa'o// rigs kyi bu gang yang tshor ba kun 'byung ba 'gog par 'gro bar mi shes pa dang / gzugs kyi phung po
30a1(mdo sde): dang / tshor ba'i phung po'i mtshan nyid tha dad par mi shes pa dang / mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid dang / mtshan nyid med pa dang / mtshan nyid tha dad pa dang / mtshan nyid gcig pa dang /
30a2(mdo sde): mtshan nyid mang por mi shes pa 'di yang rigs kyi bu gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o// yang rigs kyi bu gang phung po dang khams dang / skye mched la nyan thos dang / rang byang chub 'dod
30a3(mdo sde): pa dang bla na med pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'dod pa 'di ni gnyis pa'o/ / rigs kyi bu gang yang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi phung po dang /
30a4(mdo sde): khams dang / skye mched la rten par mi shes pa dang / yi ge'i tshig gi lam thams cad ni gnas med pa yi ge med pa/ spros pa med par rab tu shes pa 'di yang rigs kyi bu gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi
30a5(mdo sde): sgo la 'jug pa'o/ / rigs kyi bu gang dge ba dang / mi dge bar 'du shes kun tu shes pa dang / pha rol dang / tshu rol du shes pa 'di ni gnyis pa'o// rigs kyi bu gang dge ba dang / mi dge ba 'di yang
30a6(mdo sde): mtshan ma med pa kun nas ldang ba dang / mi zad pa kun tu rtogs pa 'di yang rigs kyi bu gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang tshu rol ni zad pa'o// pha rol ni
